Html:
Guys,
I unedrstand this is not fun to do, but some of the WPFable community is still hard coded to VS2005 ( yes, still using those beta WPF plugins). Any chance you can drop prism in that format too?

best regards,
Acer.

At this time we are not planning on creating a VS2005 version.

Blaine Wastell
blog: blogs.msdn.com/blaine
web: www.msdn.com/practices
